welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Humacao, Puerto Rico! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our city, known for its stunning beaches and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and savor all that Humacao has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Roosevelt NAS Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Roosevelt NAS Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
